input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product title.

Product title:
SPEEDO Aquablade Recordbreaker - Youth

Product keywords:
100% Polyester
Speedo Girl's Aquablade Recordbreaker Swimsuit
Speedo Girl's Aquablade Recordbreaker Swimsuit:
Go-To Competition Suit You Can Always Count-On for Great Comfort, Fit, & Performance
Stripes Create Channeling Effect to Streamline Water Away from Body
Fabric Offers Lower Drag Co-Efficient & is Slicker than Skin

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Speedo Aquablade Recordbreaker is a great go-to competition suit that offers great comfort, fit, and performance. The suit is made of 100% polyester fabric that offers a lower drag coefficient and is slicker than skin. The stripes create a channeling effect thatstreamlines water away from the body. This suit is perfect for any competitive swimmer who wants to perform at their best.
input_text.Response B: Speedo's Aquablade Recordbreaker is a great go-to competition suit that you can count on for great comfort, fit, and performance. It's 100% polyester fabric offers a lower drag co-efficient and is slicker than skin to ensure you cut through the water with ease. The horizontal stripes create a channeling effect to streamline water away from your body. This suit is designed for competition and training and provides superior stretch and shape retention. It's also fully lined and has a classic suit cut.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
